per_frame_init_1=xpos = .5;
per_frame_init_2=ypos = .5;
per_frame_1=acount = if(below(acount,9),acount+1,0);
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=count = count+1;
per_frame_4=bc = bc+bass;
per_frame_5=tc = tc+treb;
per_frame_6=mc = mc+mid;
per_frame_7=bb = .5*bd+.5*bass_att;
per_frame_8=bt = .5*bt+.5*treb_att;
per_frame_9=mt = .5*mt+.5*mid_att;
per_frame_10=bimp = if(above(3*bass,bass+treb+mid),1,0);
per_frame_11=timp = if(above(3*treb,bass+treb+mid),1,0);
per_frame_12=mimp = if(above(3*mid,bass+treb+mid),1,0);
per_frame_13=is_beat = if(above(bb*.9,bc/count),1*bimp,if(above(bt*.9,tc/count),1*timp,if(above(mt*.9,mc/count),1*mimp,0))); 
per_frame_14=is_beat = if(above(reha,0),0,is_beat);
per_frame_15=reha = if(is_beat,fps*.25,if(below(reha,1),0,reha-1));
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=xrand = if(is_beat,.1+rand(800)/1000,xrand);
per_frame_18=xpos = xpos+bass_att*(xrand-xpos)/40;
per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=yrand = if(is_beat,.1+rand(800)/1000,yrand);
per_frame_21=ypos = ypos+bass_att*(yrand-ypos)/40;
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=q1 = xpos;
per_frame_24=q2 = ypos*(2-aspectx);
per_frame_25=q3 = acount;
per_frame_26=q4 = aspectx;
per_frame_27=q5 = aspecty;
per_frame_28=//zoom = .99 + 0.1*bass_att+0.05*bass;
per_frame_29=
per_frame_30=wave_x = q1;
per_frame_31=wave_y = q2;
per_pixel_1=cenx = q1;
per_pixel_2=ceny = 1-q2;
per_pixel_3=brad = 2*sqrt( pow(x-cenx,2) + pow (y-ceny,2));
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=c = 20; // sharpness
per_pixel_6=//rot = .1-.1*sigmoid(brad-.3,c); //rotation
per_pixel_7=
per_pixel_8=sx = 1.175-.25*sigmoid(brad-.75,c); //zoom lens x
per_pixel_9=sy = 1.175-.25*sigmoid(brad-.75,c); //zoom lens y
per_pixel_10=
per_pixel_11=cy = ceny;
per_pixel_12=cx = cenx;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`
warp_5=`float error     = 0.5;        // maximum random pixel offset
warp_6=`float diffusion = 0.006;      // dither strength
warp_7=`float fadeout   = -0.0006;    // may be minor 1/256 due to the error diffusion dither;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw*1.5 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_10=`float magic = lum(GetPixel(lerp(uv_orig,uv, 4))) - lum(GetBlur2(lerp(uv_orig,uv,-12)));
warp_11=`uv = lerp(uv_orig,uv, magic*12 ) + (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv)-0.5)*texsize.zw*error;
warp_12=`ret = GetPixel(uv)+(tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv)-0.5)*diffusion + fadeout;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`ret=GetBlur1(uv);
comp_5=`ret+=GetBlur1(float2(uv.x+ret.x,uv.y+ret.y));
comp_6=`ret+=GetBlur1(float2(uv.x-ret.y,uv.y-ret.y));
comp_7=`ret=pow(length(ret)*ret*1.33,0.89-GetBlur3(uv));
comp_8=`//ret=saturate(ret);
comp_9=`//ret*=tex2D(sampler_noise_lq,uv*ret.y);
comp_10=`ret*=ret.z;
comp_11=`ret=ret-GetPixel(uv);
comp_12=`ret=1.4-ret;
comp_13=`ret-=roam_sin.wyx*roam_cos.zwx;
comp_14=`}
